channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Display Post Metadata
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Display Post Metadata

item.title: CVE-2021-24855|2024-08-03T19:42:17.468Z -- unknown -- display%20post%20metadata
item.description: The Display Post Metadata WordPress plugin before 1.5.0 adds a shortcode to print out custom fields, however their content is not sanitised or escaped which could allow users with a role as low as Contributor to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks
